comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Republic P-47D Thunderbolt, USAAF Ser. No. 42-8527, code "PE-V", "Ramblin' Rebel," lost February 8, 1944, Lt. John H Walker, Killed In Action (KIA). On the left is Robert H. Sharp, Jr., fighter pilot, who went Missing In Action (MIA), and ultimately declared Killed In Action (KIA), over the English Channel on June 9, 1944. See: www.warbirdsresourcegroup.org/URG/sharp.html airforce.togetherweserved.com/usaf/servlet/tws.webapp.Web...
